measure.CatchLine: Amends requirements and deadlines for sales of manufactured dwelling facilities.
measure.MeasureSummary: Before its sale to third party, requires owner of residential dwelling facility to give tenants 20 days to form tenants committee and to give any tenants committee right of first refusal. Makes other procedural amendments to conducting facility sales.] Amends requirements and deadlines for sales of manufactured dwelling facilities. Amends statutory damages owed for violations by sellers and requires plaintiffs to share damages with Manufactured Dwelling Parks Account.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to sales of residential dwelling facilities.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to sales of residential dwelling facilities.

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
Recommendation: Do pass with amendments and be printed A-Engrossed.
Carried over to April 26, 2021 Calendar by virtue of adjournment.
Third reading. Carried by Fahey. Passed.
historyActions.VoteText: Ayes, 37; Nays, 19--Bonham, Boshart Davis, Breese-Iverson, Cate, Drazan, Hayden, Levy, Lewis, Moore-Green, Morgan, Owens, Post, Reschke, Smith DB, Smith G, Stark, Wallan, Weber, Wright; Excused, 4--Hudson, Leif, Nearman, Noble.

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to President's desk.
Recommendation: Do pass the A-Eng. bill.
Third reading.  Carried by Golden.  Passed.
historyActions.VoteText: Ayes, 19; Nays, 9--Anderson, Findley, Girod, Hansell, Heard, Johnson, Knopp, Linthicum, Thomsen; Excused, 2--Kennemer, Taylor.
